explains: n. 碰撞，相撞；冲突，抵触；争用
wordGroup: collision detection [计]碰撞检测；[计]冲突检出
collision avoidance 碰撞避免，冲突避免
in collision 相撞；在冲突中
collision course 导致冲突的轨迹；碰撞航向
collision accident 碰撞事故；空中相撞事故
head-on collision 对正碰撞，正碰
collision domain 碰撞域；冲突域

sentences.en: He said it was true that a collision had happened.
sentences.cn: 他说碰撞真的发生了一次。

sentences.en: There was a slight collision but my car was undamaged.
sentences.cn: 虽有轻微碰撞，但我的汽车没有损坏。

sentences.en: The play represents the collision of three generations.
sentences.cn: 该剧表现了3代人之间的冲突。
